description:
T1 Ash - Rear garden on left hand side. Crown reduce by 1-1.5m in height and up to 2m in lateral spread to strong growth. Remove deadwood.
T2 Willow - Rear garden on right hand side. Right Hand stem reduce by 3m. Reduce left hand side stem to balance as much as possible whilst retaining privacy from neighbouring properties.
T3 Cherry â€“ Front garden. Prune tree to statutory height over public footway (up to 3m). Sensitively prune lateral branch over footway back to main crown line. Sensitively prune lateral branch towards front door back to main crown line. Crown thin by 10% by removal of deadwood and crossing branches.
decision_conditions: After consultation with the agent, the original specification for the Ash ( Crown reduction 30% 1-1.5m in width and 2.5-3m in width), and the cherry (crown reduce 20%, thin and deadwood), has been changed to lesser works within the approved tree work specification in the interests of the amenity that the trees give to the surrounding area.
